pages.text: Skip to main content Authentic Thai Cuisine Savor Authentic Thai takeout and delivery with dishes like Pad Thai and Green Curry. Customers love our bold flavors and great service in North Charleston, Hanahan, and Goose Creek. Located at Tanger Outlets. We’re your go-to for delicious lunch and dinner, crafted with fresh ingredients! Order Online View Menu Discover Thai Palm Restaurant in North Charleston, SC Welcome to Thai Palm Restaurant, a local gem at 4958 Centre Pointe Dr, North Charleston, SC, serving Authentic Thai Cuisine. Our menu shines with customer favorites like Tom Yum Soup, Basil Fried Rice, and Spring Rolls, all made with quality ingredients. Diners rave about our authentic dishes and welcoming vibe, earning us a 4.4-star rating. Whether you’re grabbing takeout or enjoying delivery, we’re here to bring vibrant Thai flavors to you!
